about_the_game:
Evil never sleeps… but it bleeds.
Get the Wild Wild East Skin Pack for Evil West to tear the undead a new one while looking fancy as hell, with a new outfit and five weapon skins.

This pack contains:
• Golden Defender outfit
• Five unique Golden Relic weapon skins for the Rifle, Revolver, Boomstick, Zapper and Gauntlet

These items are unlocked for use in-game immediately.
